about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the most powerful Bonding Ambivalence moments with this EP

This EP is composed of the most elaborated musics of the game.
In addition, the main theme, not present in the game but included in this EP: USAC:Code Breach Theme.

These songs were specially designed to blend with the atmosphere and intensity of the action.

Technical details: mp3 192 Kbits/s
